description:
Conveniently order food ahead and avoid the wait at your favorite Pita Pit location! Fresh, affordable food you can order on the web or in the user-friendly app! Pitas for any meal of the day are all available for quick, hassle-free mobile & online ordering.

The official Pita Pit app, powered by Splick.it, allows you to find and order from nearby restaurants in a quick and convenient way. Customize your meal, redeem mobile & web promotions, discounts and offers, select a pickup time and your food is ready for takeout when you arrive at your local restaurant. You can skip to the front of the line, pickup your food, and go!

Features:
-Easily locate nearby Pita Pit restaurants that accept mobile and online ordering
-Choose from the full menu
-Pay & order ahead - select a pickup time up to four hours in advance
-Features special offers, coupons, and promotions for delicious deals
-Save your favorite meals for faster orders
-Share activity with friends & family on Facebook and Twitter
-Even leave a tip!

Why you'll love it:
-Avoid lines!
-Maximize your time during your lunch break
-In-a-hurry-friendly takeout ordering
-Makes group ordering a breeze - for families or offices
-Customize and save your favorite meals for fast and easy ordering
-View the menu and select your toppings to customize your order
-Use the app for great deals
-Safe & secure payment options
releaseNotes:
* An improved "Rate Me" button, addressing an issue leading to an empty link.

* We've upgraded our "Favorites" feature with a move to the cloud.  Your favorite items saved with web orders are now available on your phone and vice versa.  Name and save your favorite orders after checkout.  That perfect mix of toppings shows up conveniently at the top of the menu next time you begin an order! 

* Other fixes to eliminate various small bugs.
